title: Tower of Power: 50 Years of Funk & Soul: Live at the Fox Theater - Oakland, CA - June 2018
description: With a history 50+ years in the making, Tower of Power has been a funk institution since 1968, knocking out hits like 'What is Hip', 'So Very Hard to Go', 'This Time It’s Real' and 'You’re Still a Young Man' while lending their soulful sound to collaborations with Santana, the Grateful Dead, Elton, Huey Lewis, Justin Timberlake and everyone in-between. '50 Years of Funk & Soul - Live at the Fox Theater' captures their storied career with no-holds-barred victory lap concerts in Oakland, CA, performing their full spectrum of life-affirming funk and soul hits to sold out audiences in 2018.
